rev.desc.rev.desc: Hua: Fixed panel exit.bg so that exit status "bad.val" will not get overriden
There is now a flag in the phase record that will allow a change phase to be closed if there are still open tasks (unless it is the last phase in the change).
On check.master.fc, changed exit condition from name in $L.fc.master~=name in $L.fc to not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc)
No longer sets date.entered and close.time to tod() on set.vars. Instead date.entered is set in trigger.cm3r.pre.edit and trigger.cm3t.pre.edit and close.time in cm.close.save.
Now calls get.base.form.name to set up the format control name. The master.fc field in the object record is referenced instead of the filename to select the master format control record.

descript.descript: Hua: Fixed panel exit.bg so that exit status "bad.val" will not get overriden
There is now a flag in the phase record that will allow a change phase to be closed if there are still open tasks (unless it is the last phase in the change).
On check.master.fc, changed exit condition from name in $L.fc.master~=name in $L.fc to not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc)
No longer sets date.entered and close.time to tod() on set.vars. Instead date.entered is set in trigger.cm3r.pre.edit and trigger.cm3t.pre.edit and close.time in cm.close.save.
